briefdescription.para: Status/error codes returned by libopentracedecode functions.

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* otd_log_callback) (void *cb_data, int loglevel, const char *format, va_list args)
memberdef.argsstring: )(void *cb_data, int loglevel, const char *format, va_list args)
memberdef.name: otd_log_callback

briefdescription.para: The public libopentracedecode header file to be used by frontends.

detaileddescription.para: This is the only file that libopentracedecode users (frontends) are supposed to use and include. There are other header files which get installed with libopentracedecode, but those are not meant to be used directly by frontends.
The correct way to get/use the libopentracedecode API functions is:
